summary: This is the VR version of my other popular game "Cyber Driver". It integrates all the optimizations of the latter and is completely re-created for VR control. In the game you will drive a hover taxi to avoid obstacles and pick up passengers, and continuously accumulate higher scores.

name: Cyndaria
summary: Explore the mysterious Crypt of Cyndaria and unearth its secrets. A plethora of traps to avoid, puzzles to solve and devious creatures are waiting for you to step into this ever-changing dungeon, with lan and online support.

name: Cyrano Story
summary: Born from an Alternate Reality Game experience created by Alice & Smith in 2019, Cyrano Story is a complex puzzle game designed to ascend to intergalactic forces and give insight into the backstory of Funcom’s cosmic horror game Moons of Madness.

name: Cyclone
summary:
Cyclone is a challenging yet simplistic game in which the player must use the mouse cursor to navigate a circular maze. 
 
Play in two game modes: Normal and Spin

name: Cygni: All Guns Blazing
summary:
It's a twin-stick vertical scrolling Shooter hybrid with a cinematic flare:

An unrelenting onslaught of eye-popping visuals, ear bursting soundscapes and mind-melting action makes Cygni the vanguard for the next generation of shoot-em ups.

name: Cyber War: Fight to the Last Man
summary: CyberWar is a multiplayer online game, playable on PC. The focus is on player vs. player gameplay with each player piloting a battle hovercraft. The objective is to destroy enemy troops and complete the mission either by destroying all vessels of the opposing team or capturing the enemy team's base. The player takes control of a single hovercraft of his choice, and enters the battle on a random map. The player has control over the hover's movement, firing, and can communicate with allied players via the text chat. The goal is to survive and save the human race from extinction by breaching into the heart of the enemy's defense, while contending with traps, drones, robots.

name: Cyber Manhunt
summary: Cyber Manhunt is a story-oriented puzzle game focusing on big data, hacking, citizen privacy, and social workers. It focuses on social issues such as cyber violence and privacy breaches.

name: Cyberpunkdreams
summary:
Cyberpunkdreamss is an evolving text-based role-playing adventure with countless opportunities, and endless chances for destruction. Take on the role of a lone wanderer sent to the gates of Cincinnati, in the 2090s. The sand from the desert badlands coats your clothes and skin – with your memories torn from you, all you have is a weapon on your hip, and a mission to complete.

Enter a living, growing world, with new stories each month and limited time events – you’ll always find new surprises waiting for you in the alleys of Cincinnati.

Who will you become in this cesspool of a city? Will you play their games and climb to the top, or be forgotten amongst the march of time and tyranny?

name: Cyberdreams
summary: Cyberdreams is a 1998 megawad by Gonzalo Pérez de la Ossa and Albert Valls. It is well known for featuring puzzles involving cyberdemons in each level, which the player is forced to solve without the use of weapons.

name: Cyber Drak-Cools-Yas From Mars: Rat and Bat. Love and Hate.
summary: A bored rat writes some excellent self insert fanfiction

name: Cyber Seraph
summary: The alien invaders have launched their final offensive on an already crippled Terra. Only one brave pilot can turn the tide of war. Cyber Seraph is a boss focused vertical shoot 'em up with unlockable abilities.

name: CyberTaxi
summary: CyberTaxi is an action-packed driving first-person shooter and taxi simulator set in a grim vision of the future. You play as a cab driver who works in a dark-noir Hindenburg city and strives to escape this hellish location.

name: Cyberchase: The Quest
summary: Cyberchase: The Quest is an isometric point-and-click game. The player can move their character within and between screens, talk to non-playable characters, buy from and trade with shopkeepers for items, and interact with and collect certain objects.

name: Cybershow
summary: Cybershow is a fast-paced first-person sci-fi action shooter. Battle your way out of the city against the local military and police!

name: Cybel
summary: Cybel is a frantic top-down shooter set in a unique occult science-fiction universe. You play as Cybel, a girl who will climb the floors of a heavily defended industrial tower to find revenge.

name: Cyber Crush 2069
summary: You, as a ripperdoc (self-proclaimed), have started your new clinic in a corner of Little China. With your cyberware fixing skill, will it help you to impress the girl?

name: Cybershock: Future Parkour
summary: Cybershock: Future Parkour is a runner game with outrun aesthetics in which you are an antivirus. Your mission is to destroy all the viruses on your computer before they destroy you. For this you must parkour through the different levels and avoid all the obstacles that stand in your way.

name: Cyber Emoji Tale 2099
summary: Cyber Emoji Tale 2099 is a classic RPG with elements of a graphic novel, set in an open rail world with a system of hardcore real-time battles, in the universe of the near future.

name: Cyber Troopers: Virtual On x Toaru Majutsu no Index - Toaru Majutsu no Dennou Senki
summary:
Get in the Virtualoid cockpit, take your weapon, and prepare for an ultra-violent-post-modern battle, because YES, Virtual-On has returned! InToaru Majutsu no Virtual-On, a new generation of 50-foot mechas are ready to battle hard, but this time they’ll be equipped with magical powers. We’re not joking, indeed this new chapter is a crossover game with the light novel series “Toaru Majutsu no Index” published by Dengeki Bunko.

Use the combat systems strategically to reduce your challengers into a molten mass of twisted metal, more you’ll win and more money you’ll earn to develop and improve your machine’s parts and abilities to pilot the deadliest war machine into the heart of intense battles.

name: Cybxus Heart
summary:
Inspired by classic Japanese shooting games. This is a game where you control three different characters at the same time.

You can swap between characters depending on situation. But protect your central core with the all cost!

name: Cyberika
summary:
Cyberika is an action-adventure MMORPG with a deep storyline set in a cyberpunk universe. Are you ready to explore a city in the near future called Bradbury Complex?

Meet its inhabitants, complete important quests, fight with freaky punks in dark backstreets and race through neon lit streets in your sports car. Who knows, maybe on your way home you’ll stop in downtown to install another body implant or grab some ramen?

name: CyberHive
summary: Survive, gather resources, expand your crew, improve your starship, and pave the way through outer space – full of hostile races. Your path will consist of difficult choices and everyone will have an influence on the outcome. …and perhaps you might be able to solve the mystery of this universe. FLYING AMONG THE STARS You are the commander of the “Melistar” (“The Star Bee”), and you have a swarm of intelligent anthropomorphic bees. Your ship is your home, and your mission is to keep an eye on its fighting ability to repel enemy attacks; to stay on course, and to effectively collect resources to ensure that both the Queen and soldier bees have enough food; and, of course, to keep an eye on the status of your crew, whose members strive to get into trouble or arrange it. OTHER SPECIES The ship travels through an amazing universe full of strange insectoid races. Who you’ll be forming an alliance with, and who you’ll be fighting with, is largely up to you! The Merchant Guild fights the League of Smugglers; the intelligent Ants compete with Locusts for space colonies; the sinister cult of Blood Suckers spreads across the galaxy... We’ll have to fight and trade – and every one of these decisions can be a turning point in the story. SURVIVAL AND STORYTELLING * You can try your hand at surviving. Space cycles alternate, resources run out – and the crew increases; but luck and accurate calculation are on your side! Competently upgrade your ship and set the…

name: Cyber Illusion
summary:
Around the turn of the millennium, global warming has become a reality. Abusing energy and the Earth's resources, humanity has driven itself to a point where normal life on Earth could no longer exist. Drastic rise of temperatures caused planet-wide dehydration. The only way to keep existing was through the Cyber Net, a virtual reality system. But soon the Cyber Net began to suffer from continuous assaults by hackers, who programmed lethal viruses into it. Thus, the Cyber Police was born. The protagonist of the game is a high-ranked officer of Cyber Police. With the help of his team, he has to solve the hacker problem once and for all.
The game has explicit sex scenes, which are interactive and feature a point-and-click interface.

name: Cyjin: The Cyborg Ninja
summary:
Use only your mouse to beat this difficult platformer!

Cyjin: The Cyborg Ninja is a unique precision platformer featuring fast-paced gameplay with accelerated dashing action. The game is simple to pick up, yet challenging to master. Take control of the cyborg ninja -- use only your mouse to take on tough enemies and hellish levels.

You'll have to be a true ninja with lightning reflexes to beat this game. During your journey, you will face many challenges that will push your gaming skill to the limit -- and you'll do it with only your mouse! It's not just the lasers obstructing the path or the deadly spikes, but also the army of hostile yōkai-inspired robots that will try to kill you before you take the next step! Can you find your way out of these dangerous, enemy-infested mazes in one piece? Get your mouse ready to help Cyjin defeat the fearsome Shōgun!

Game Features:

Unique Mouse-based Twitch Control - Experience one of the most unique gameplay with mouse-based precision platforming. Master how you twitch your mouse to get Cyjin into lightning action. Using your ninja-fast mouse skill, overcome challenges of all kinds created by our crazy developers.

Accelerated Dashing Action - Take control of your cyborg ninja in accelerated dashing action, and strike your enemies. A fun way to crush your enemies with speedy destruction.

Swift and Precise Platforming - Aim with your mouse to target your path and landing. Manage your precision and timing to pass through tricky obstacles.

Exciting Bosses - Our developers have prepared intense bosses of all sizes that will stomp whoever challenges them. Get yourself ready for exciting boss fights that will challenge your precision, speed and skill!

2D Oriental Cyberpunk - Savour the rich world of Cyjin, blending oriental inspiration with cyberpunk theme. Adventure through different areas, from the deep wasteland of the Junkyard, to the industrial grime of the Automation Factory, and the traditional futurism of the Urbanscape. All combined into a platformer and a retro atmosphere.

Challenging Puzzles - Each level contains puzzles which will require quick thinking and ninja-fast timing to navigate. Can you solve them with the limited time you have?

Beat this game with just your mouse, only then you can be a true ninja.

name: Cyanide & Happiness: Freakpocalypse - Episode 1
summary: As Coop "Go Away, Weirdo" McCarthy, all you want to do is make the world a better place. The trouble is: Nobody likes you, school sucks, you can't find a prom date, everybody bullies you (including your teachers), and your attempts to help only makes things worse. Will you escape high school alive? Who will love you? Why is this game called Freakpocalypse? Find the answers to these questions and more by looking at, talking to, and touching everything within the Cyanide & Happiness universe. This game is part 1 of Coop’s trilogy of tragedy: • In this point-and-click adventure, control Coop in his quest to be the hero he always wanted to be by helping the people of Netherton! Talk to, touch, and look at everything in your environment! That sexy looking clock? Ask it to prom! That rotting piece of fruit? Touch it! Jump into the Cyanide & Happiness universe: • Did we mention the sheer amount of fully-voiced freaks and friends you’ll see from some of your favorite animated shorts? Feast your eyes on familiar faces as you fetch, find and frolic through your environment! Meet famous folks like Ted Bear, Shark Dad, Señor Cleanfist, and more! Help with a wide variety of side quests: • The citizens of Netherton need help. Like, a LOT of help. Fortunately(?) for them, there’s Coop! Enjoy the full gameplay experience by finding dangerous markers, buying frozen drinks, and trying to make people less miserable! (Or at least hate you less) Discover a plethora of costumes, easter…

name: Cyberpunk Madness
summary: Cyberpunk Madness - is a 3D hardcore shooter with surviving elements in which there is a story of one man suffering from psychiatric disorder.

name: Cyber Hentai
summary: Cyber Hentai is an action-adventure game set in the city of the future. Androids have gone crazy and you need to deal with it.

name: Cyber City Escape
summary: Cyber City Escape is a 3D topdown roguelite shooter set in a cyberpunk world. The game features procedurally generated maps, fog of war fueled exploration, multiple weapon types, multiple enemy types, environmental hazards and traps, equipment kiosks to buy gear, permanent progression and more.

name: Cynoroid Gaiden
summary: Free aiming platformer. Shooting Creatures by 360° aiming!! Bloody & Gore pixel arts, Hard 8bit music !!

name: Cyberpunk SFX
summary: What can be more spectacular than a girl armed with rockets and a sense of humor? Yes, she is about to start solving the problems of the 21st century. And if you want to make sure she doesn’t create a few new ones, you’ll have to show her the way.

name: Cyber Psychosis
summary: Cyber Psychosis is a pseudo-3D dynamic first-person shooter in a cyberpunk setting with a lot of enemies, blood and drive

name: Cyberspace: Infinite
summary: Cyberspace: Infinity is a strategy-oriented idle game. Multiple automatic combat systems can be easily played without complex operations. Dominate the world with your legendary team, let your enemies know who is the real champion of cyberspace!

name: Cyber Lemur
summary: Cyber Lemur is a challenging 2D couch-multiplayer game with a variety of game modes including race, jump, and battle. The controls are difficult to master, but can be made easier by having two players control the same character. The game is great for parties, or those who love a challenge.

name: Cyborgs Attack
summary: Cyborgs Attack is a tower defense game, where you as the player, build turrets to stop the invading cyborg forces. The turrets all have 3 upgrade phases to them and do different kinds of damage. From direct single target to splash damage. Will you be able to stop the cyborgs in time?

name: Cyberpulse
summary: Slam your way through waves of viruses and hurl your friends through cyberspace in this flashy arcade thrower that combines classic twin-stick action with inventive physics for an electrifying adventure.

name: Cycled
summary: Cycled is an interdimensional roguelike where you combine skills and strengths of two heroes to overcome ever-changing challenges

name: Cyberforge: First Light
summary: Cyberforge: First Light is a FREE developers build for our top-down cyberpunk adventure, Cyberforge! Control a trio of cyber-enhanced dwarves each with unique skills and weapons as the strive to survive this endless mode challenge. If you enjoy the Dev Build please Wishlist the Full Version.

name: Cybershift
summary: Cybershift brings a neon-lit new world, strikingly reminiscent of the legendary Tron series, test your reflexes and abilities to the maximum, defeat all opponents, solve all the puzzles and win in this unique Puzzle game.

name: Cyber-Cat
summary: Cyber-Cat is a fast-paced, action, first-person shooter, where you take control of a cat with cybernetic enhancements and outfitted with advanced weaponry.

name: Cyberflight
summary: Cyberflight is a high-speed, cyberpunk flying-car game with detailed, living, procedurally generated levels, backed by an atmospheric and original 80's soundtrack

name: Cyberplug
summary: Cyberplug is a 2D platformer, where you control an electric being capable of moving at high speed and use electricity to advance through enemies and destroy a corporation that rules the cyberpunk themed city.

name: CyberVirus
summary:
CyberVirus is one of the most highly sought-after “lost” games for the Atari Lynx. Songbird acquired CyberVirus (along with Ultra Vortex and Mechtiles) from Beyond Games over two decades ago. Finally, a first person shooter game for the Atari Lynx!

CyberVirus puts you in the role of the last surviving member of the Demolitions Ops Guerrillas (or DOGs) of War. You’ve got to stop the horde of bio-mechanical nasties that are threatening mankind with extinction!

Features:

Sixteen brain-frying missions
Realistic 3D first-person perspective and motion, similar to BattleWheels
Multiple weapons, including laser, grenades, and mini-missiles
Wide variety of terrain, from the jungles of Central America to the deserts of Southwestern USA
Plenty of foes, including bio-robots, mutant spiders, land mines, turrets, and more!
NEW! Stealth armor
NEW! More cheats than you can shake a stick at!

Originally developed by Beyond Games, the title was abandoned due to the Atari Lynx lagging sales. The title's code and assets were later sold to Songbird Productions, who later completed and published the title in 2001, releasing the CinciClassic Edition in a limited 25 copies.

Later in 2018, Songbird released a wider release on the standard title.

name: Cyber Cult City
summary: Cyber Cult City is a hoverboarding and hacking Cyberpunk roguelike focused on hit and run tactics.

name: Cyberush
summary: Rush through floors of a building on the way to get your revenge on the Boss up top in this fast-paced VR shooter! Choose from four different classes as you swing, blast and slash your way through CYBERUSH!

name: Cybrid
summary: Cybrid is the action-rhythm VR of the Cyber Future! Swords and Pistols are in your hands. Slash and Shoot! Don't let this stop you! Run, dodge and jump among the neon lights of the night city to a powerful soundtrack!

name: Cyber Girl 1.0: Booting
summary: You will be controlling Tala, a female cyborg full of mysteries and with amazing abilities. It is time to boot up her system and help in her quest of revenge against the person who completely changed her life!

name: Cyber Defense 2088
summary: Cyber Defense 2088 is a fully immersive, 3D VR tower defense shooter. You will fly around in this new cyberspace world to stop attacks with many weapons, turrets, and defenses. Tons of levels and over a dozen cyberpunk music tracks to enjoy!

name: CyberBorn
summary: Welcomme to Cyberborn! A truly Cyberpunk Multiplayer FPS game. The game using Unreal Engine 4 , 5 Different very high detailed maps, with 5 different game modes. 5 Different Class , and 4 different ability. The Game is working on Online , and on LAN as well. Your PC is ready? "No More Future"

name: Cyber Rider
summary: "Cyber Rider" is a super high-speed arcade racing game. Your only goal is to avoid the cars on the road and keep moving forward, and strive to continuously break the score records you created before. This game can be played with one hand.

name: Cybloc
summary: This unique fast paced skill based 2D platform game will put your game play skills to the test. Your goal is simple but your time is limited. Come and compete for that top spot on the global leader-boards and be the best Cybloc player of this strange electrical realm.

name: CyberGrid: Tower defense
summary: Tower defense is a Tower defense game containing HQ, Tower, and 3 building that generates resources. In order to build a building, you must have enough resources. Each building can generate different resources. You must protect the HQ from the Enemy

name: Cytoclash
summary: Cytoclash is an action-packed lightgun-style shooter that calls upon you as Earth's best hope against a monstrous alien invasion! Suit-up and blast your way through hordes of enemies and massive bosses in the debut release from Setrino Software!

name: Cyber Factories
summary: Cyber Factories is an Automation and Base Building game in a cyberpunk universe. You lead a small colony of human remnants. Help them to survive, expand and gather enough resources to leave Earth for their new home planet.

name: Cyber Noah
summary: Classic arcade game, improved by role-playing model and integrated into the story. A fascinating interactive narrative about the formation of A.I. Decisions affect the gameplay, reveal the game mechanics and lead to one of the 16 main endings.

name: Cybergeist
summary: Cybergeist is being hunt by the cops unfairly, his alleged crime: be an android with the burst mode. Help him escape as long as you can in this cyberpunk-themed endless runner. Collect the burst spheres, activate the burst mode and destroy them all!

name: Cyber Attack
summary: Take control of an elite global team of hackers, intercepting communications between corporations, governments, and criminals all around the world. You can protect humanity by exposing messages between dangerous individuals or exploit corporations to increase your fortune. The choice is yours.

name: Cyclotronica

Cyberchess is a 1-player chess teaching and playing tool based upon a mechanical chess playing machine.

Based upon a series of four previously played games between chess grandmasters, the player must set up their own chess board and follow along with these games. Gameplay consists of multiple-choice questions, where the player tries to guess the move the grandmaster player made next. If the player gets the move correct, they are rewarded with points. If they guess incorrectly, they are docked points based upon how poor their move was in relation to the the grandmaster. The score is followed through the game, with the player ultimately being rewarded a final score based upon their chess game.

In the center of the conflict will be the ruling elite of Iceberg City and the usual mercenary Max, who will have to learn the human essence and stop the insidious plans of the greedy mafia. Use all tamed technologies, vehicles, weapons, absolutely everything to save humanity from extinction.

The future of our world is in your hands.

Dolphin virus threatens free networks: The dolphin virus spreads through and corrupts active memory, ravaging programs and data alike. The decentralized networks have been hit harder than any other and will soon suffer total memory corruption.

In desperation, the spread of corruption has halted by deactivating core memory, rendering entire systems impassable and hence their resident programs unusable.

Sources in the scene have, at great personal cost, siphoned a military-grade antivirus program that can be our only hope for eradicating the virus - providing its sophisticated layers of encryption can be broken.

We must now make our last stand, reactivate and scour dormant system memory, seek decryption programs, unlock and run the anti-virus to eradicate the dolphin virus.

The narrative centers on the aftermath of the President of the New United States of America's orbital shuttle being shot down over Dogtown, one of Night City’s most dangerous districts. Players control V, a mercenary tasked with navigating a complex web of espionage and political intrigue.

The expansion introduces Dogtown, a heavily militarized, autonomous zone ruled by a strict and authoritarian leader. With support from NUSA sleeper agent Solomon Reed (voiced by Idris Elba) and returning character Johnny Silverhand (voiced by Keanu Reeves), players engage in a story involving shifting alliances and covert operations. Designed for next-generation hardware, Phantom Liberty features new gameplay mechanics, side activities, and a main storyline centered on themes of power, trust, and survival.

summary: Collect synergizing items to create an overpowered character to fight hordes of cyclops monsters. Cyclo Chambers is a fast-paced, top-down arena shooter with light rogue-like elements. 200 items to choose from to create frantic combinations. Different runs every time.

name: Cyber Protocol: Retro Arcade
summary: Find your way around demanding challenges, traps and mechanics. They may be easy to grasp but they're very hard to master. Find a way to gather all of the coins and become the best hacker.

name: Cyber Slayer
summary: Battle your way through waves of robots as you attempt to survive in an unforgiving, grungy arena. Bathe in glory as you put on a good show for the audience, and be rewarded with upgrades. Try to last as long as you can to put your name down in history!

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Project Orion
summary: The Cyberpunk 2077 sequel – codenamed ‘Project Orion’ – will be developed by CD Projekt Red North America, a new studio opening in Boston, USA, and “prove the full power and potential of the Cyberpunk universe”, the company said.

name: CyberTD
summary: Help protect the core of cyberspace from mutant viruses in this innovative tower defense game packed with roguelite elements! Will you be able to build the ultimate line of defense?

name: CyberTitans
summary: CyberTitans is a multiplayer strategy game with crazy mechanics where you lead your Titans against the world. Recruit your Titans, position them on the field and send them into the battleground. Choose the smartest way to manage your economy during the game, merge Titans, level up your Totem or roll the cybershop to summon up to 44 unique characters.

name: Cyphernaut
summary: Explore the Mobile Asteroid Battle Station "Nemesis" as you hunt down the Cyphernaut in this physics based metroidvania.

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Edgerunners Update
summary: The Edgerunners Update (Patch 1.6) brings various gameplay fixes and improvements, free DLCs, as well as content inspired by Cyberpunk: Edgerunners, an anime that will premiere on Netflix on September 13, 2025.

name: Cyber Velocity Run
summary: You are thrown into a mysterious speedrunning facility where the journey begins. Handcrafted levels designed to be puzzling and unexpected.

name: Cyber Rebellion
summary:
Go to the Otherworld... Go and defeat the Invaders!
The destroyer [Apocalypse] has fully intruded the real world, and the "α virus" has gradually eroded our space... Inspectors! Warriors! Please resist the enemy and protect our Skyfall City together! Your mighty will never back down!

name: Cycle
summary:
"Cycle" is a reimagining of the game (P.T. Silent Hills), using original game mechanics and sounds with a short and bizarre story. Using the same "Loop" system to progressively tell the story.

Consider this game as a horror experience where there are no goals other than walking as you progress through the game

name: Cycladea
summary: Explore a massive (625sq km) procedurally-generated world based on Ancient Greece. For 1-10 players! Survive and fight countless enemies based on Greek Mythology. Explore, Fight, Gather Resources, Build your base and overcome everything and become Zeus' next Demi-god!

name: Cyber Bodies
summary: Gather your willpower and investigate the truth about your past in a harsh and gloomy cyberpunk-style world. Take a closer look at others - who knows what goals they pursue and why they need you. Have fun, kill, fuck and uncover the main secrets of your bodies! Who knows what awaits you…

name: Cyber Dungeon: Excalibur
summary: Cyber Dungeon: Excalibur, brings fun and an action-adventure experience with frantic combat, hail of bullets and robots. Can you stay alive until the end?

name: Cyball
summary:
Cyball CyBall is a futuristic football-themed (US: soccer), NFT-based game where users can collect and form a team of CyBlocs and face off against other teams online, or trade and mentor new CyBlocs within the CyBall's ecosystem. Initially, the game will launch on BNB Chain with immediate plans to launch on Solana as soon as it is ready to create a multi-chain gaming environment.
The CyBall game engine combines different elements of strategy, simulation and chance into the form of an exciting and competitive turn-based football card game, where players compete to see who can score the most goals. Players train up their CyBlocs to compete in various game modes with varying levels of rewards. Existing CyBlocs can also mentor young CyBlocs, creating the next generation of unique NFTs. In future expansions, we aim to give players more ways to spend accrued rewards, both in CyBall and in the wider CyBloc universe.

name: Cymut x Mutrobo
summary: Help Dr. Albert to save our planet from this uncontrolled mutation of Cymuts and Mutrobos. Play with a friend on the same screen in 2 player mode.

name: CyberBrick
summary: CyberBrick presents classic brick breaker arcade action in a new re-imagined unique game where the better you are at staying cool and composed, the more points you will likely score.

name: Cyber Skirmish
summary: Welcome to the mysterious world of "Cyber ​​Skirmish". You have to complete the most difficult mission - save the galaxy "Amperls" from the enemies. To do this, you will have to go through a series of battles. Use your laser cannons to shoot down as many enemies as possible! Good luck, Pilot.

name: Cybersphere
summary: CyberSphere is a Role-Playing MOO set in a dark American future. Your virtual journey begins in New Carthage, the denizens of which range from the benign eccentric to the malicious psychotic. Shadowed alleys conceal dark secrets, and gleaming towers of urban wealth hide fantastic conspiracies.

name: Cygnus Enterprises
summary:
Cygnus Enterprises combines action RPG and base management elements and is set on the alien frontier world of Mytilus.
Currently in Early Access, Cygnus Enterprises offers approximately 12 hours of content which will be expanded upon further in future updates.

name: Cyber Furry Girl
summary: A logical game in which your task is to collect puzzles and open the pictures with furry girls in cyber style.

name: Cyberwar: Neon City
summary: Explore a cyberpunk universe where monkeys rule. Challenge the fearsome Cyber Monkeys as you take on the role of a hero armed with a living shark weapon.

name: Cycle Chaser H-5
summary:
Mysterious Aliens have occupied a scorched Earth. A lone pilot seizes the skies. What is it they're after?

Cycle Chaser H-5 is a horizontal arcade-style shoot-em-up. Burn through waves of impenetrable foes with a sleek arsenal of weapons. Defeat foes to harvest their energy, then activate the powerful 'Super Tatsujin' system for maximum power and defense!

name: Cyberlaser
summary: CyberLaser is an augmented reality-based puzzle game that uses your real-life environment to enroll you in exciting puzzle challenges. The goal is to guide lasers to the energy crystals using mirrors, portals, and explosions.

name: Cyber West: Hidden Object Games - Western
summary: A unique cyberpunk western! Conduct an investigation like a real detective in the world of Cyber Wild West! The newest hidden object game with a storyline. Сarve out your own legend!

name: Cyberblock Metal Orange
summary: Cyberblock Metal Orange EX plays very similar to Arkanoid, but with a cool twist. Instead of powerups falling from random blocks, you get upgrade tokens. Upgrade tokens go to your upgrade bar. Pressing a button spends your upgrade tokens while the other can be used to shoot your zapper if you have that powerup. The upgrades you can get have crazy sci-fi names, but they basically do what you expect them to do. Speed up, multi ball, expand your paddle, that sort of thing. Managing your upgrades and customizing your paddle is a large part of the game and it is easily the most fun part of the game.

name: Cyclic
summary: Cyclic is a mod for Minecraft that adds helpful items, blocks, inventory features, world generation, simple machines, gameplay tweaks, new villagers, and more changes that do not follow any particular theme.

name: Cyber Courier 2088
summary: Cyber Courier 2088 is a cyberpunk sci-fi courier game, where you start out as a taxi driver transporting passengers and goods as you become a sought-after cyber courier in a crazy low-poly Sci-Fi world.

name: CycloManiacs
summary:
Compete against and unlock 20 riders, 26 levels, and 70 achievements!

Have you got what it takes to beat the Moon Haddock and become the Cycle Champ?

name: CycloManiacs 2
summary: Long awaited sequel, with much much more stuff to do! 50 bikes to unlock, masses of tracks and events to play, and hidden minigames etc.

name: CycloManiacs Epic
summary: The evil Haddock has taken over the movie studio. Use all the stars on their bikes to defeat the smelly fish!

name: Cyberscape
summary: Cyberscape is a top down round based action game with some rougelike elements. Play as different heroes with unique abilities and fight against the evil robot army. Level up and complete achievements to unlock new items and fight your way through different locations.

name: CyberHeroes Arena DX
summary: Customize your robot for unique combat and fun!

name: Cyber Combat
summary: Pure, unadulterated neon speed combat! Feel the adrenaline as you fight at breakneck speeds in this fast-paced minimalist movement shooter. Maneuver around Tron-like cyberarenas with your grappling hook, taking advantage of your momentum to bring pain to your enemies with a powerful arsenal.

name: Cyberpunk
summary:
It’s the beginning of the 22nd century.

Society has collapsed amid rapid technological progress. People are modifying their own bodies extensively. Corporations war with one another over data, which has become the most valuable commodity on the market.

Your group, made up of cyborgs equipped with special skills, has decided to steal some rare data from the archives of an influential corporation. Infiltrating the complex unnoticed, you must get to the archives and download the stack memory. But there won’t be anything easy about that.

name: Cyberlinxx
summary: Experience the thrills of a cyberpunk adventure with a cast of strong, independent women. Dive into the shadows of the Megacity Arriaka and find out who wanted to kill you.

name: Cyber Souls
summary: Cyber Souls is a souls-like game, tells the story of Cyborg trying to understand its purpose and get the "soul". He wasn't always half human - half machine. The corporation kidnapped him and conducted a series of medical experiments. It's time for revenge.

name: Cyber Mission
summary: Side-scroller, with beautiful 2D pixel art, addictive shooter gameplay, classic levels and weapons that will let you perform a symphony of destruction of the alien base in the black eye galaxy.

name: Cyber Lust
summary: Cyber Lust is an adult game set in a cyberpunk world.

name: CyberCum: Pussy Attack!
summary: The main character (Craig) is a famous porn actor in the world of the not-too-distant future, who has invested a lot of money in upgrading his body to perform the most unusual scenes in his work.

name: CyberVault
summary: Fast paced bullet hell roguelike. Upgrade your weapons and abilities as you collect attribute blocks. Highly customisable with lots of combinations. Fight bosses, pick up items and improve your stats. Unlock new items and achievements for the next run through the ever-changing dungeon.

name: Cyberference
summary: Fight terrorists and robots in this old-school fast paced first person shooter. Grab a friend to help you put an end to their terror with split screen support or each enjoy your own monitor with dual monitor support.

name: Cyber Detective
summary: Cyber ​​Detective is an adventure puzzle game. You play as a detective with the ability to shrink your body. Use the Cybergun with three special abilities to solve the case!

name: CyberTac
summary: CyberTac is a 3d vehicle combat game. Dodge and weave your way around the levels as you engage the enemies. Tactical powerups let you strategize best course of action. Frontal assault all guns blazing or quick in and out strikes while you shield yourself. You choose the best strategy!

name: Cyber Tamer
summary: Evolve your mech-enabled Cybermon, investigate the mystery behind your family's death, and craft the strategy of time to become the world's best Cybermon trainer!

name: Cyber Neon Bundle
summary:
Step into the neon-soaked world of Cyber Vibes with Cyber Neon Bundle - where you'll hunt, slash and survive your way to victory in two adrenaline-fueled games!
Cyber Neon Bundle is a collection of two cyber theme games; Cyberhunt and Razortron 2000. Both are frenetic action games where you’ll use your skills to win everything!

name: Cyber Neon Bundle
summary: Step into the neon-soaked world of Cyber Vibes with Cyber Neon Bundle - where you'll hunt, slash and survive your way to victory in two adrenaline-fueled games!

name: Cyber Heart
summary: Cyber Heart is a single-player, story-driven mech shooter where you, a commander, ride your customizable mech through an open world to fight against enemy AI machines.

name: Cyber Strider
summary: Blast your enemies! Create the ultimate build! Travel to the edge of space, in this epic rogue-lite action packed bundle of chaos inspired by slay the spire & FTL.

name: Cy: Cyberpunk Survivors
summary: Cy is a psionic superheroine battling to save humanity against hordes of zombies, mutants, and killer robots with only her ever-evolving mental powers to protect her. Will she survive the sinister onslaught or is she destined to become just another victim of an evil, unfathomable intelligence?

name: Cyber Citizen Shockman
summary: Slash and shoot your way through robots rampaging in Shockman's town!

name: Cyber Soldier
summary: Fast-paced competitive online multiplayer and offline survival mode, guns and overpowered skills, you and getting cash!

name: Cyber Ninja that Climbs the City
summary: You, the Ninja, have to climb up the skyscrapers of Cyber Tokyo using your grapple, while destroying the Tokyo cops with your Katana and Beam Gun! Play simple run of three stages aiming for the top of the Cyber Tower of Tokyo!

name: Cyber Dose
summary: Part puzzler, part farm-sim, part cyberpunk, part serious game. You are an AI databot in a new neural network in the HeXR Cloud. Gather data on digital twins of illicit drugs beamed in by AI health bots. Build your neural network. Stay BOOSTED while completing tasks or you could end up in bot rehab.

name: Cynostone
summary: An ALL NEW RPG with skill based combat and enemies you can befriend!

name: Cyberside Picnic
summary: Cyberside Picnic is a eulogy for the cyberian commonplace that just eluded us. A love letter to a lost future of alternative video games, delete and overwrite.

name: Cyber Hunters
summary: Try your skills and have fun with our amazing bundle of two action games.

name: Cyclopong
summary:
Platform with 3 ping pong rackets rotates.
Tap on the screen to flip rotation direction and bounce the ball around. Bounce it as long as you can!
Longer you keep bouncing it, better score you get.

name: CyberThreat
summary: CyberThreat is an upcoming turn based RPG with life simulation elements, set in a modern day city. Can you win the war in CyberSpace, or will you fall to the viruses once and for all?

name: Cybergrid Runner
summary: This is a stealth puzzle game set in a cyber city. Help the hacker infiltrate the system by manipulating the intricate 5x5 tile system. Collect powerful implant upgrades and weapons. Brace yourself for endlessly thrilling playthroughs, as each session unveils procedurally generated labyrinth.

name: CyberWave Survivor
summary:
CyberWave Survivor, the survival space shooter with minimalistic gameplay and tough choices through ship upgrades!!
Defend the cyber planets from waves of enemy ships, Shmup style!! Tracking missiles, boss ships and more..
Every wave ends which allows for decisions for upgrading the ship, if currency allows..

name: Cyber: Mind Dive
summary: This is a game in which a beautiful girl sneaks into the spiritual world to explore the secrets of Cyber City. Players need to find the way to the truth in the layer-by-layer randomly constructed heart network world.

name: Cydonia
summary:
22 Plutonia maps created by @AD_79 and myself. Complevel 4/limit removing format.

Designed to try and emulate Casali mapping with old school compact, high impact maps.

name: Cyb's Freaky Colonoscopy
summary: Cyb's Freaky Colonoscopy is a limit-removing medical documentary of the various doctors and nurses from Doomer Boards, led by Big Ol' Billy. With 11 levels of carnage, it's the biggest, baddest and grossest DBP adventure yet! Shoutout to the two members making their DBP debut: Hardcore_gamer and dmdr!

name: Cybersecurity Ethics Scavenger Hunt
summary: An educational, interactive 'I Spy' game. Visit locations, find objects, and solve ethical dilemmas using your cybersecurity experience.

name: Cyber Assault
summary: Welcome to the world of Cyber Assault, an exhilarating top-down shooter in the Japanese style, set in a mysterious Japanese mountain monastery.

name: Cybertrash Statyx
summary: Cyberthrash Statyx is tactical 2D action-platformer. Run, jump, slide, destroy enemies, gain experience points, upgrade your character - Jenet which trying escape from corporation.

name: CyberNet Duel
summary: Become a Legend! Here is a deck-building game in the cyberpunk genre. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of corporations and gangs, implants and cyberpsychosis. Fight in quick card duels where strategy and luck are equally important.

name: Cybersonic Strike
summary: Cybersonic Strike is a fast-paced, top-down shooter roguelite set in a worldwide cybersystem under siege by hordes of AI invaders. Craft uniquely powerful builds and recruit charming party members from across the globe to help you hack deeper into the system and cleanse the corruption.

name: Cyber Paradise
summary: Revive Mini the Dog digitally through 2D roguelite actions; craft her cyber paradise with beloved moments, like sniffing dog butts XD. Uncover a deeper dystopian narrative and strengthen friendships in cafe chats—a frenetic yet cozy journey.

name: Cyberfield
summary: Take on an epic combat challenge to defy the champions of Cyberfield! Assemble a unique combination of skills and enhancements in this roguelike game to rise to the top of the best warriors and compete for the grand prize of the steel arena.

name: CyberStrike Chronicles
summary: Cyberpunk multiplayer madness: Fast-paced battles, cooperative, four fierce characters, and a neon-lit cityscape.

name: Cyber Storm Edge
summary:
Fast-paced 2D Retro Side Scroller Platformer! Fight against Cyber Space Pirates!
Attack and shoot through the stages and defeat each stage boss.
A total of 5 stages, and one unlockable character, one time trial per stage, and one No-Damage challenge per stage.

name: Cyber Prison Management
summary: You are tasked with managing 8 prisoners in a flying space prison for 30 days with your camera system. You'll need to manage the stock market, hostile ships, and keep prisoners in line. Or play as one of the prisoners, hiding and trying to escape. But be careful - danger is always around the corner.

name: Cyber Cell
summary: Set in a post apocalyptic world, Cyber Cell is a fast paced shooter meant to be both challenging and satisfying. Fight your way through the levels to find out who is behind your suffering.

name: Cydoku
summary: A cyber themed, procedural generated, graphical Sudoku with over 2 million unique play-field permutations. Track your mastery by claiming achievements and gauge your play via in-game statistical analysis and Steam Leader boards!

name: Cyber Space Driver
summary: This is First Person, Endless Driving game in CyberPunk setting.You can choose any of (4) CyberPunk style maps, Upload your own music, songs, tracks to the Game Radio. Through your way, you be able to see Different, Random, CyberPunk Events.

name: CyTale
summary: Cytale is an immersive fantasy multiplayer online game that revolves around a rich lore featuring dragons, adventurers, and the battle against dark forces. Set in a world where dragons were once revered rulers, players embark on quests and challenges to overcome the aftermath of their withdrawal, leading to a world filled with danger and dark magic. The game combines elements of adventure, fantasy, and strategy genres. Its unique features include a captivating storyline, dynamic multiplayer interactions, and a focus on fostering a strong player community. With a seamless blend of exploration, combat, and teamwork, Cytale offers players a chance to engage in an epic journey of cooperation and heroism.

name: Cybrix
summary: Play the racket game from the future in your living room today! Are you ready to break a sweat in this ball bouncing, brick smashing madness? Can you destroy every single brick by swinging the rackets, shooting laser guns and detonating explosive balls, all while dodging shrapnel, charging up the piercing ball and collecting power-ups? Compete against your friends on the global leaderboard in 50 different levels or try to get as far as you can in the endless mode (sweat towels are sold separately)! Can you smash them all?

name: Cyber Sprint
summary: Cyber Sprint is all about speedrunning mastery. Players must become adept at navigating the digital landscapes with unparalleled agility, employing a combination of sprinting, sliding, jumping, and wall-running to maintain momentum and shave off precious seconds.

name: Cyborg3003
summary: 6-player co-op survival horror at its finest with cyborgs, monsters, and aliens.

name: Cyberpunx
summary: Doom2 episode with 9 levels with custom monster behaviour via Dehacked.

name: Cylon Attack
summary: Cylon Attack is a pseudo 3D space shooter played from a first-person perspective and clearly based on the American TV series Battlestar Galactica where the Cylon race is featured, but not carrying an official license. The player is the only interceptor pilot on an Earth supply mothership. He has to survive the different attack waves of the enemies while defending the ship. At the start of each wave he is launched in a fighter ship and needs to destroy all enemies to survive the wave, while flying around freely.

name: CyberGroove
summary: CyberGroove is one of the oldest known DDR clones released for PCs. In Taiwan, it was released as an "upgrade" to Dance 2000.

name: Cyberpunk 2
summary: A sequel to Cyberpunk 2077 planned as the next major Cyberpunk project after the release of Phantom Liberty.

name: Cyberpunk 2077: 2.0 Update
summary:
Cyberpunk 2077: Update 2.0 introduces a comprehensive, free overhaul of the game's core systems. Key changes include a redesigned cyberware system, where armor stats are now linked to equipped cyberware rather than clothing, allowing for greater customization and strategic trade-offs. The update also revamps the perk system, adding abilities such as bullet deflection, mid-air dashing, and new finishing moves, along with a new skill tree tied to the Relic chip in V’s body for enhanced abilities.

The update introduces a vehicular combat system, enabling players to engage enemies while driving, including shooting and hacking nearby vehicles. This addition is accompanied by changes to the game’s “wanted” system, with escalating responses from the NCPD, culminating in confrontations with the heavily armed MaxTac Psycho Squad.

Update 2.0 also adds over 100 new items, including weapons, clothing, cyberware, and vehicles, expanding the game’s customization and combat options.

name: Cygnus IV
summary: 14 levels of hard-hitting Doom II action, with new graphics, sound and music, and some damned impressive scenery!

name: Cyberjump
summary: Cyberjump is a fast paced 2D cyberpunk-themed platformer game where you need to jump on platforms that appear only for a short time and avoiding deadly traps, keeping track of the time of existence of the platforms and think over the movements in advance so as not to fall down.

name: CyberPigeon
summary: Take control of CyberPigeon, the ultimate cybernetic avian warrior, as you engage in intense battles against swarming drones and formidable bosses. Adapt to the ever-changing environment, collect power-ups and weapons, and rise to the top of the leaderboard in this thrilling aerial showdown.

name: Cypher 007
summary: Cypher 007 is a top-down mobile action game published by Tilting Point. Inspired by 60 years of Spycraft and Cypher 007, players will experience the world of Agent 007 to revisit Bond's most iconic moments and locations. Players are tasked with defeating criminal mastermind Blofeld, head of Spectre, by gathering intel, uncovering secrets, and overcoming immersive levels filled with obstacles, opponents, and objectives that increase in difficulty as they progress. Compete against other 007 agents worldwide via leaderboards to prove who is on top.

name: CyberSkyscrUpper
summary: This game has no text and can be played in any language! There are no repeating annoying sprites in the game! You get into the building of a space elevator, but it turns out that the elevator is broken and you have to go upstairs on foot, it will be an unforgettable Cyber Trip.

name: Cyberpunk: Red-Light District
summary: Cyberpunk Red-Light District is a game for adults set in the world of Cyberpunk.

name: Cyber Citizen Shockman 2: A New Menace
summary: Jump, fly, and blast your way through nostalgic gaming.

name: Cyber Tower
summary: Cyber Tower is a 3D cyberpunk Tower Defense game. Defend the city against virus-infected autonomous vehicles across 40 missions. Strategically place towers to eliminate enemies efficiently.

name: Cyber Avenger
summary: Cyber Avenger is a top-down action game where you take on the role of a highly skilled covert operative on a dangerous mission to stop a group of terrorists. You must navigate through five maps, facing a variety of enemies, including shotgunners, snipers, melee fighters, kamikazes, and more.

name: Cyber Rail
summary: Jump, grapple, slide and swing your way through a flying convoy, fending off bandit gangs with a deadly arsenal of unique weapons and upgrades. Challenging, fast-paced parkour mechanics and unique gunplay deliver a roguelike experience unlike any other.

name: Cyrgoth's Manor
summary: Cyrgoth's Manor is a 7 level singleplayer WAD for HEXEN, designed for GZDoom and Zandronum. It was also designed with Co-op in mind and the maps are also optimized for deathmatching modes as well. It contains 1 secret level in addition to the 6 mandatory levels. There are secrets in this WAD, however, like in Hexen, they are unmarked, so good luck finding all of them!

name: Cyrgoth's Revenge
summary: Cyrgoth's Revenge is an 8 Level Single-Player Hub which is a sequel to Cyrgoth's Manor. While being Single-Player oriented, Cyrgoth's Revenge can also be played in Co-op and Deathmatch modes, however due to the large map sizes, the latter is discouraged. Like in it's predecessor, there are numerous unmarked secrets throughout the span of the Hub, as well as a secret level, which isn't as easy to find as the one in Cyrgoth's Manor.

name: Cyber-Assassin
summary: The Cyber-Assassin will be awoken. Coming soon is an epic single-player game that combines hack and slash with third person shooter, all set in a cyberpunk inspired open world.

name: Cycle Scramble
summary: Race as some wacky characters as you try to become the champion!

name: Cycle Scramble 2
summary: Cycle Scramble is back for more wacky fun! Race against opponents across wild tracks, trying to meet objectives to unlock new crazy characters and earn money for upgrades.

name: Cyber Blade: Action Platformer
summary: Cyber Blade is an adrenaline-pumping cyberpunk action game with a pixelated twist! Destroy your enemies to the beat of stylish music, dodging traps and lasers!

name: Cycle Idle RPG
summary: An RPG where your character is constantly grinding - even when you're offline!

name: CyVenge
summary: CyVenge is a fast paced and action packed rougelite arena shooter. Choose from many upgradable weapons and abilities and help Cy fight against numerous waves of enemies!

name: CyberFall
summary: CyberFall is an open-world survival game set in a post-apocalyptic Cyberpunk setting with base-building and crafting. Players fight to survive against new threats as well as each other.

name: Cyber Mice Party
summary: Guide your cyber mice back to the cheese helping them avoiding certain disaster!!

name: CyberFarm
summary: CyberFarm allows you to experience the authentic life of a Russian village in the year 2124. Dive into both the bright and dark facets of the Russian soul!

name: Cyberdelic
summary: Cyberdelic is an immersive FPS - Use a combination of weaponry to pierce your hostiles shields, armour and flesh. Swap out cybernetic components to best suit your combat encounters. Explore an interconnected environment acquiring additional tools to your arsenal.

name: Cyberpunk 2088
summary:
Flying cars in cyberpunk madness await you.

If you want to walk down the street in the city of the future in a world full of flying cars in a true Cyberpunk frenzy, you are in the right place. While the charge of your vehicle is decreasing in the flying car mode, collect the charging items in the flowing traffic and let the vehicle continue its journey. But be careful, because the cars fly, there may be cars flying all over the place, be careful not to hit them and collect the highest score. Don't forget to check out the entertainment venues in the city of the future. Have fun...

name: CyberRush
summary: Dive into CyberRush, an adrenaline-fueled blend of Subway Surfer and NFS. Race through procedurally generated Cyberpunk levels, evading police, blasting obstacles, and competing for highscores. Experience the rush of neon-lit streets in this fast-paced infinite runner

name: Cyber Manhunt: New World
summary: A narrative-driven puzzle game that combines themes of big data, cybersecurity, and artificial intelligence. Play as an AI assistant in a major corporation. Deploy intricate social engineering tactics and expose hidden truths in a world of ambition, deception, and advanced technology.

name: Cyber Puncake
summary: Welcome to your favorite TV show “Goodies Everyday”. "BD Plus" that lets you live different lives in others’ brains. Be a gangster, a pineapple dragon boss, or a snack stall master. Come and watch the first part of BD Plus: Cyber Puncake, where you control the stall master to cook pancakes.

name: Cyber Serpent
summary: slither and shoot, but don't run out of space! cyber_serpent is an arcade twin-stick shooter combined with snake. compete for a global high score in this modern take on retro classics as you face infinite waves of polygonal enemies.

name: Cyber Horny
summary: Cyber Horny - is an exciting 2D game, the essence of which is to find paired colors. And as a reward, you will receive an image with an incredibly beautiful girl. This game will give you aesthetic pleasure. Everything in Cyber Horny is aimed at making you experience the real pleasure of this game!

name: Cyberpunk Sex
summary: Cyberpunk Sex is a quest game with a lot of sex. Find the key (sex toys) to open another room

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition
summary:
Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition is an open-world RPG containing two powerful adventures: the base game of Cyberpunk 2077, taking place in the dark future of Night City, and Phantom Liberty, a spy-thriller story set in the walled-off district of Dogtown. Players take on the role of V, a cyber-enhanced mercenary, and embark on a fight for survival filled with story-defining decisions, action-packed gameplay, and unforgettable characters, including rockerboy Johnny Silverhand (played by Keanu Reeves) and FIA sleeper agent Solomon Reed (played by Idris Elba).

This new release is the perfect way to experience every story of the dark future; it also contains the free Update 2.0, which overhauled many of the game’s systems, introducing dynamic skill trees, high-octane vehicle combat, and enhanced enemy and police AI — as well as adding new weapons, vehicles, and clothes. The release is bolstered with a set of previously released digital goodies available as part of the “My Rewards” program, available to all who register.

name: CyberVerse Showdown
summary: Welcome to CyberVerse Showdown, the ultimate card game set in a futuristic cyberpunk world! Unleash your strategic powers as you assemble a team of powerful cybernetic warriors, hackers, and technologically advanced humans to battle against AI rivals or PVP with a Friend.

name: Cyan Avenger
summary: This is a game that combines bullet evasion, flying shooting, and rhythm music gameplay. There is a unique way of storytelling. You can enjoy the joy of fighting against other spacecraft from a 2D perspective, accompanied by music. The game level belongs to small games.

name: Cybercore Leap
summary: Embark on a captivating journey alongside your loyal assistant in this experimental 3D platformer game. Equip yourself with the JumpPack and antigravity grapple as you undertake your mission: locate the cybercore and execute a crucial reset.

name: CyberVerse
summary:

summary: A synth-soaked mining game about paying off an unfair debt and Monster Girls. Break blocks while your employee battles endless legions of monstrous women.

name: Cyber Sentinel
summary: Dodge enemies and upgrade yourself in Cyber Sentinel, a retro-inspired 2d shooter that keeps unfolding. Unlock new abilities and patterns and keep upgrading yourself to survive.

name: Cyber Tank Nano
summary: Cyber Tank Nano is a puzzle game which adds various mechanics on top of the Sokoban genre

name: Cyber Tower 2048
summary: Cyber Tower 2048 is an action tower defense game where players fight insectoids by building defenses and developing tactics.

name: Cyber Cafe Simulator
summary: Take control of your very own internet cafe in Cyber Cafe Simulator. Design, furnish, and maintain a thriving cyber cafe that attracts customers of all kinds.

name: Cyberpong AI
summary: Retro style fantasy ping pong game with coachable AI players.

name: Cyber AI Defense
summary: Humanity was hacked — except you

name: Cyber Evolution
summary: The most anticipated cyber adventure begins in 2025! In a future world where the supermind has risen, the Earth has plunged into chaos. People with special abilities, called "supermen", have become the hope of salvation. They launched an operation codenamed "Inception". And you, as one of the participants, will have to use your powers and go on a new journey!

name: Cyber Cleaner Simulator
summary: Vacuum space junk, polish derelict ships, and clear alien worlds of debris as you upgrade your high-tech cleaning gear.

name: Cyber Siege
summary: Cyber Siege is a fast-paced twin-stick shooter with pure gameplay. Play solo or in local co-op up to 4 players. Upgrade your character and weapons as you fight 100+ enemy types across 20 levels in 4 distinct worlds.

name: Cybercity: Sex Saga
summary: In "CyberCity: SEX Saga", players are plunged into a searing, pleasure-driven dystopia. This adult-only RPG confronts the carnal reality of futuristic existence, blending explicit content and intricate character dynamics to craft a narrative strictly for mature audiences.

name: Cybersex Chronicles [18+]
summary: Immerse yourself in the sensual world of "Cybersex Chronicles [18+]", an Adult-Only 3D Dating Simulator that intertwines mystery, strategy, and explicit passion. This game blends narrative storytelling and management mechanics to create a thrilling exploration of intimacy and desire.

name: Cyborg Arena 2
summary: Armed with your minigun, complete all the missions and unleash your firepower on the cyborgs! Keep moving and achieve the best online score !

name: CyclingArcadeRaceSimulator
summary: CyclingArcadeRaceSimulator is a fun cycling simulation for ANT+ FEC devices. Opponents automatically adapt to your performance. Experience action-packed races on Formula 1 tracks, in the mountains, or in the desert!

name: Cyber Runner
summary: "Cyber Runner" is a small cyber-style arcade running and avoiding game. In the game, your only goal is to continuously break the score records you have previously created.

name: CyberCook
summary: A cyberpunk PS1-style cooking game, serve up more than just food. Slice through enemies, decide their fates, and uncover dark secrets hidden within your dystopian kitchen.

name: CyberArena
summary: Fast-paced 2D arena shooter where you control a combat mech and fight endless waves of deadly robots. Inspired by Vampire Survivors and Hotline Miami, with roguelike elements, upgrade choices, and stylish pixel art.

name: Cyclopean II: The Dreamlands
summary: Cyclopean II: The Dreamlands takes you into the dark fantasy setting described in H.P. Lovecraft's Dreamquest of Unknown Kadath and other stories of his Dream Cycle.

name: Cyber Horror: Project S.Y.L.A.
summary: Survive in the quarantined cyberpunk city of Cybranth against the rogue A.I. S.Y.L.A. Track the trail of your missing sister, uncover hidden notes, evade deadly robots, and reveal the truth in this survival horror experience.

name: Cybrid: Survivor
summary: CYBRID: Survivor - is a single-player shooter with survival elements. Use your entire arsenal, fight hordes of robots, mine resources and unlock powerful upgrades as you clean up the streets at night. You are alone, against everyone!

name: Cynabre
summary: Cynabre is a tactical shooter game played in teams, pitting two factions with divergent technologies against each other. Defeat your enemies using different strategic classes in a universe mixing SteamPunk and science fiction. Cooperate and trap your opponents to capture the Cynabre.

name: Cyte
summary: Blaze your path as CYTE, a being created to guard the flow of time, as you dash and slam your way through a mysterious enemy’s mechanical army in this first person 3d action game. Fight through a unique science fiction world in the perfect blend of intense combat and lightning-fast movement.

name: Cyberpunk City
summary: One of the first functioning metaverses built on Unreal Engine 5, offering immersive & unique gaming experiences as well as socializing & holding events.

name: Cybernoir
summary: Become a nameless detective in a cyberpunk city of the future. Explore an open world, face dynamic action, make moral choices, and uncover a dark, gripping story.

name: CyberSmash
summary:
CyberSmash is a high-speed endless runner set in a neon-soaked cyberpunk metropolis.

Players pilot a heavily modified street racer through rain-slicked city streets, crushing rogue AI robots while dodging environmental hazards.

The game combines the addictive nature of endless runners with the aesthetic appeal of retro-cyberpunk, creating an adrenaline-fueled experience of urban destruction.

name: Cyber Evolution
summary: Cyber Evolution is a fast paced, third-person multiplayer shooter where every round is a chance to evolve, adapt, and outplay your opponents. Dive into a neon-soaked cyber arena where physics-based projectiles, skill-based combat, and ever-evolving upgrades create endless variety.

name: Cyclia Journey
summary: This title, CYCLIA JOURNEY, is a 2D puzzle action game set in a geometric world where everything is governed by the “The Law of Replication & Re-creation”

name: Cyber Shard Clicker
summary: Cyber Shard Clicker is a short cyberpunk incremental game. Break down geometric shapes representing hostile cyber attacks against Vault Inc., gather data shards, upgrade your hacking skills, and unlock permanent boosts in the vast skill tree to push your cyber assault even further!

name: Cyan Heart
summary: A horror exploration puzzle adventure where you relive events through a selfie viewpoint. Alone, with only voice communication from comrades as support, she simply keeps the camera rolling. Witness the record she wished to leave behind.

name: Cyberlords Arcology
summary:
The citizens of the Asgard Arcology are terrorized by corporate security forces.
Lead the Resistance and save the world from total surveillance!

name: Cyberpunk Store Simulator
summary: Cyberpunk Store Simulator puts you in charge of a neon lit shop in a dystopian city. Manage stock, serve customers, sell cybernetic implants, and explore the streets. Build, customize, and grow your store into a futuristic empire.

name: Cycle Maabou
summary: A man on a monocycle bounces on objects and traverses through other stages. Arcade game by Taito.

name: Cyber Girls
summary: A puzzle game featuring tons of cool and cute Android girls is here!

name: Cyber-ART
summary: Cyber-ART is a clicker game. In the game, you need to click on the artworks! You will get a random artwork every three hours, allowing you to continuously expand your art collection!

name: Cypher
summary: Help a lost astronaut interpret mysterious glyphs and understand an alien language by making your own cypher.

name: Cyber Lab
summary:
Cyber Lab is a challenging 2D platformer with 30 levels set in a futuristic laboratory full of traps and deadly hazards.
The player controls a small robot through a series of precision experiments where every wrong move could be the last.

name: Cyberemo 2007
summary: Cyberemo 2007: “Wake up damn you, Emo, we have a lot of veins for cuts!” Old-school platformer breathtaking game.

name: Cygnus Leapt
summary:
Three years ago Erin started dating his best friend, a ballet dancer named Cygnus. Between Cygnus' mental illness, their desire to move forward as partners, and increased demands and stress from his job, an overwhelmed Erin has recently pulled away from his relationship. His struggles with avoidance have left him and Cygnus in a limbo.

However, when Cygnus passes away suddenly, Erin's decisions are rendered irrelevant. After getting a posthumous email from Cygnus, Erin uses his position at the Department of Last Thoughts and Unspoken Words to review Cygnus' last week and things they left unsaid.

Erin now has to figure out where he stands in relation to his partner, their passing, and the where the two of them belonged. Accepting death is never easy, especially when you still have yet to accept the life you led together. One last kiss for my lover, because it's time to say goodbye.

name: Cyndefense Remastered
summary: Cyndefense Remastered is a casual Tower Defense game. With multiple modes its really easy to jump into a game and play for 10-20 minutes. For those who desire a challenge, the game offers multiple harder difficulties and maps if the casual experience is a little too casual.

name: Cybersoul
summary: Deckbuilding Card Game meets Incremental Data Mining. Command 3+ dystopian factions & 100+ cards in this acid-soaked Cyberpunk Card Battler. Unleash glitch-fueled combos, gamble in a corrupted Arcade, and farm Souls & Star Power in idle clickers. Don't just play the game—break the code and ascend.

name: Cybersoul: Retribution Protocol
summary: System Update: Retribution Protocol is live. Inject 3 new Factions into the mainframe: The honor-bound Neon Dynasty, the fanatical Silicon Priesthood, and the brutal Riot Squad. Total System Access: 6 Factions & 200+ Cards. Enforce the law, worship the code, or die by the blade.

name: CyberTD: Cartridge Card Style
summary: This free DLC offers you a new style for your cards in CyberTD, reminiscent of the good old cartridges, which you can use in the game.

name: Cybersoul: Undercity Rot
summary: System Breach: Undercity Rot is spreading. Contaminate the grid with 3 new Factions: The illicit Black Market, the mutating Helix Vats, and the deceptive Media Moguls. Total System Access: 9 Factions & 300+ Cards. Mutate the flesh, spin the truth, or steal the win.

name: Cybersoul: Digital Sorcery
summary: System Patch: Digital Sorcery is active. Hack the reality engine with 3 new Factions: The time-warping Chrono Drifters, the occult Circuit Mystics, and the glitching Transhacks. Total System Access: 12 Factions & 400+ Cards. Rewind the clock, curse the code, or ghost the machine.

name: Cybersoul: Cosmic Resonance
summary: This expansion pushes Cybersoul beyond the atmosphere, injecting three new, reality-shattering Factions: Deep Spacers, Sonic Hedons, and The Transcended! Master the void, weaponize the rhythm, and leave humanity behind in the ultimate conclusion to the roster.

name: Cyberknight: Awakening
summary: Awaken in a kingdom where magic has been long forgotten. Build your deck, engage in real-time strategy combat, and stop the corrupt technological uprising in this cyber-fantasy roguelike.
